about_the_game:
"Incredible things coming out of Latin America right now"

-Hakita (Creator of Ultrakill) about the game 

"John Brazil"

-Vinny (Vinesauce)

BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3 is a fast-paced ultraviolent BRAZILIAN old school FPS heavily inspired by the first Quake, and using the same engine as the game (ID TECH2). It is A TRIBUTE TO THE BRAZILIAN MODS OF THE 2000S, THE BRAZILIAN BOOTLEG GAMES OF THE 2000S, BRAZILIAN MUSIC AND THE KING OF BRAZILIAN MUSIC, MIT AIA!

YOU ARE A MIT AIA FAN, A LEGEND OF BRAZILIAN 70S FUNK MUSIC, AND YOU TRIED TO REVIVE HIM IN THE FAVELA WHERE YOU LIVE WITH A PENTAGRAM, THINGS TOOK A BAD TURN AND YOU OPENED A PORTAL TO HELL! ALL THE PEOPLE IN THE STATE OF RIO DE JANEIRO GOT POSSEEESSED! IT'S UP TO YOU TO FIND A WAY TO STOP THE HELL INVASION!

  • Use your quake-ish movement abilities to stay mobile and avoid the relentless attacks of the dead, demons and other BRAZILIAN POSSESSED.

  • ALMOST EVERY WEAPON IN THE GAME IS BATHED IN GOLD AND ALSO THE ROCKET LAUNCHER HAS THE COLORS OF YOUR FAVORITE BRAZILIAN TEAM, FLAFLAMENCO!

  • A BUNCH OF ENEMIES GOING FROM ARMED DEMONS TO ZOMBIES, BRAZILIAN TRUCK CLOWNS AND EVEN POSSESSED BRAZILIAN SINGERS!

  • 24 STAGES GOING THROUGH THE ENTIRE STATE OF RIO DE JANEIRO, HELL AND EVEN HEAVEN! SAVE RIO AND SAVE MIT AIA! (The game has 17 levels at the moment in early access)

  • LOTS OF SECRET AREAS ON EACH LEVEL!

  • -COOPERATIVE AND DEATHMATCH ON ALL MAPS

  • -EAT PASTEL AND DRINK CANE BROTH TO GAIN HEALTH! IT'S SCATTERED ON THE MAPS!

  • REPLAY THE GAME WITH ROCKET JUMPING TO FIND EXCLUSIVE ROCKET JUMP SECRET AREAS! OLD SCHOOL 90S STYLE!
